content: the sister scarf is worked flat back and forth in stockinette stitch with rib at each end each stripe is worked across 40 row and approx 4-4 5 g of yarn have been used for each stripe in this version get out all your cashmere scraps and swap with others at your knitting club to get new colors scraps weighing as little as a couple of grams can be used **size ** one size **length ** approx 190 cm \ 74¾ inches\ **gauge ** 25 sts x 30 row = 10 x 10 cm \ 4 x 4 inches\ in stockinette stitch on a 3 5 mm \ us4\ needle or the required needle size to obtain gauge **needles ** circular needles 3 5 mm \ us4\ / 60 cm \ 24 inches\ and 3 mm us2½ / 60 cm \ 24 inches\ **materials ** the scarf weighs approx 63 g distributed between 14 different colors and approx 4-4 5 g have been used of each color cashmere classic by cardiff 25 g = 112 m \ 120 yds\ **or** cashmere premium by lang yarn 25 g = 115 m \ 126 yds\ **or** pure cashmere by sysleriget 50 g = 224 m \ 245 yds\ **or** cashmere by mondial 25 g = 115 m \ 126 yds\ **or** cashmere 6/28 by pascuali 25 g = 112 m 120 yds cashmere klassisk by gepard garn 25 g = 105 m 115 yds **or** compatible cashmere by knitting for olive 25 g = 150 m \ 164 yds\ the last one worked with two strands of yarn held together **difficulty ** ★ ★ 2 out of 5 see the classification of difficulty here 1 the multicolored sister scarf is knitted in **cashmere classic by cardiff** in the colors marilyn \ 662\ silver \ 509\ niwa \ 725\ and neve \ 501\ **cashmere klassisk by gepard garn** in the colors lilla \ 650\ and orange \ 234\ **cashmere premium by lang yarn** in the colors 139 115 and 217 **cashmere 6/28 by pascuali** in the colors rosenquartz \ 10\ and lilac \ 62\ **compatible cashmere by knitting for olive** in the color valmueblå and **pure cashmere by sysleriget** in the color piña colada the colors are placed in the following order **pink ** cashmere classic by cardiff marilyn 662 **creme ** cashmere classic by cardiff silver 509 **green ** cashmere classic by cardiff niwa 725 **dark purple ** cashmere klassisk by gepard garn lilla 650 **brown ** cashmere premium by lang yarn 139 **light rose ** cashmere 6/28 by pascuali rosenquarz 10 **red ** cashmere klassisk by gepard garn orange 234 **blue ** compatible cashmere by knitting for olive valmueblå **rust ** cashmere premium by lang yarn 115 **yellow ** pure cashmere by sysleriget piña colada **white ** cashmere classic by cardiff silver 509 **red ** cashmere klassisk by gepard garn orange 234 **purple ** cashmere 6/28 by pascuali lilac 62 **green ** cashmere premium by lang yarn 217 1 https //www
